message.content:
A hand blower is a kind of device used for creating air streams by swiftly moving a fan or impeller with your hands. 
It is typically held in one hand, and activated by manually cranking a handle or pulling a cord. 
The device may have a cylindrical or rectangular shape, and is usually made from plastic or metal materials. 
The surface texture may be smooth, ribbed or painted to improve grip. 
A hand blower often comes in a variety of colors, including black, white, and gray. 
It can be used for a variety of purposes, such as drying wet objects or cooling down a person on a hot day. 
Hand blowers can be found in various settings, including households, workshops, and outdoor events.
